tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage
type: Tutorial Step - A Note on Event-Evaluation

definition.text: Did you notice that once the trigger stage is active, the conditions of the trigger on event are no longer evaluated?

paragraphs.text: The opposite goes for the trigger off event conditions: they are not evaluated before the stage is active. See for yourself!
The trading bot follows the protocol that governs trading systems and only evaluates the events that are required at any moment in time!
It's logical, right? The bot aims to be as efficient as possible and does only what needs to be done!
